scripts.flatten: truffle-flattener contracts/Timelock.sol > contracts/flattened/Timelock.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/SmartChef.sol > contracts/flattened/SmartChef.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/HOPSBar.sol > contracts/flattened/HOPSBar.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/BeerToken.sol > contracts/flattened/BeerToken.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/BeerLoverToken.sol > contracts/flattened/BeerLoverToken.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/MasterChef.sol > contracts/flattened/MasterChef.sol
